channel.title: From beginner to craftsman
channel.description: A blog about craftsmanship practices, writed by a developer like you

item.title: My first blog
item.description: Hi! my name is Damián Pumar, this is my first blog, well in this blog I try to share my experience as a Software developer working in Codurance, in my opinion the best place to learn, share and improve your software skills.
item.dc:creator: Damián Pumar
